headline: Nasdaq Halts MaxsMaking Inc.
summary: NEW YORK, Dec. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Nasdaq Stock Market® (Nasdaq: NDAQ) announced that trading is halted in MaxsMaking Inc. (Nasdaq: MAMK) for additional information requested from the company. Previously, the Securities and Exchange Commission effected a trading suspension in MAMK from 04:00:00 on November 17, 2025 to 23:59:00 on December 1, 2025. The last sale price of the company’s shares was $13.00. More information about the SEC’s order can be found at https://www.sec.gov/files/
